document.full_text: black eyed peas singer fergie is in the running for a judge's spot on the upcoming u.s. version of "the x factor," but creator simon cowell said on thursday that producers were still juggling dozens of names for the tv talent show.
document.title: fergie joins "x factor" contenders as producers squabble
lines_and_colors: black eyed peas singer fergie is in the running for a judge's spot on the upcoming u.s. version of "the x factor," but creator simon cowell said on thursday that producers were still juggling dozens of names for the tv talent show.
